effects: Increase ATK by 50% when equipped with a Throwing
name: Quick Gamble

desc_short.0: Boost MP by 20%, add chance of dodging some physical attacks, and boost ATK when equipped with a throwing weapon
desc_short.5: Aumenta los PM un 20%, puede esquivar algunos ataques físicos y aumenta el ATQ al llevar un arma arrojadiza
